name: Music_4236.wav
keywords: ['folk song', 'yodelling song', 'male voice', 'guitar song', 'amateur recording', 'waltz beat', 'simple percussion', 'moderate tempo', 'happy mood']
caption: This folk song features a male voice yodelling. There are no lyrics in this song. This is accompanied by percussion playing a waltz beat. The guitar plays double stops in a descending pattern before the singing starts. The notes are harmonized as per the major scale. A bass plays the root notes of the chord on each count of the bars. The mood of this song is happy. This recording is an amateur recording. This song can be played in a movie scene on a hill with green grass.
